items.name: Death Rush
explicitMods: Recover 4% of Life on Kill
Gain Adrenaline for 3 seconds on kill
flavourText: To truly appreciate life you must be there when it ends

items.name: Tempest Scratch

25% chance to Blind Enemies on hit

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports skills which create Minions.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 17% increased Minion maximum Life
Supported Skills have 49% more Minion maximum Life
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Animates a melee weapon or armour, attaching it to an invisible Guardian that fights by your side. Animating multiple items attaches them to the same Guardian. You cannot animate unidentified items. Cannot be used by Traps or Mines.
explicitMods: 122% increased Minion Maximum Life
Can use Items requiring up to Level 100
Minions' Attacks deal 126 to 184 additional Physical Damage
Minions deal 76% increased Physical Damage with Melee Attacks
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Atziri's Promise
explicitMods: Gain 8% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect
2% of Chaos Damage Leeched as Life during Effect
Gain 8% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: "Death needs not your understanding. It needs only your loyalty."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

items.name: Dying Sun
explicitMods: 136% increased Charges per use
41% less Duration
20% increased Area of Effect during Effect
Skills fire 2 additional Projectiles during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: All things must die.
Whether you burn out or explode is up to you.

items.name: Taste of Hate
explicitMods: 10% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage during Effect
Gain 15% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage during effect
30% chance to Avoid being Chilled during Effect
30% chance to Avoid being Frozen during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A sip will freeze your lips,
A swig will chill your heart,
A glass will still your soul.

items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Nimis
explicitMods: +57 to Dexterity
34% increased Projectile Damage
Projectiles Return to you
Projectiles are fired in random directions
flavourText: Too much of something is bad enough;
too much of nothing is just as tough.

items.name: Cinderswallow Urn
explicitMods: +90 to Maximum Charges
Recharges 5 Charges when you Consume an Ignited corpse
188% increased Charges per use
25% reduced Mana Cost of Skills during Effect

items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A controlled burn is sometimes necessary for new life.

items.name: Crystallised Omniscience
explicitMods: Modifiers to Attributes instead apply to Omniscience
+1% to all Elemental Resistances per 15 Omniscience
Penetrate 1% Elemental Resistances per 15 Omniscience
Attribute Requirements can be satisfied by 25% of Omniscience
flavourText: That winter, scorched refugees emerged from the shrine,
speaking only in strange tongues. They prayed to a new
symbol of power, not out of love, but out of fear.

items.name: Zeel's Amplifier
explicitMods: 47% increased Spell Damage
+60 to maximum Energy Shield
+70 to maximum Life
1% increased Area of Effect per Enemy killed recently, up to 50%
You have Zealot's Oath if you haven't been hit recently
flavourText: "Great minds wish to reveal all the secrets of time and space.
But it does not matter. Creation, the act of Matter Metamorphosis,
is the only secret worth discovering."
- Zeel, Vaal Tinkerer

 raising up to 40% as they stay in the Aura for 4 seconds

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff which lets you deal more physical damage. The Sentinels of Purity have a single-target melee attack and an area melee attack.

Maximum 4 Summoned Sentinels of Purity
20% increased Minion Movement Speed
Minions have 40% more Maximum Life

items.name: Headhunter
explicitMods: +55 to Strength
+66 to Dexterity

flavourText: "A man's soul rules from a cavern of bone, learns and
judges through flesh-born windows. The heart is meat.
The head is where the Man is."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Has 2 Sockets
Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
10% increased Attack Speed
+58 to maximum Life
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: Midnight tinkering begets midday murdering;
a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.
